CATEGORIES.title: Dinnerware
CATEGORIES.description: Hand-finished in the Tagus Valley region of Portugal with locally sourced and recycled clays that are fired twice to create everyday durability.

subs.title: Speckled White
subs.description: Classic speckled white dinnerware that's hand-finished in the Tagus Valley region of Portugal. Made with locally sourced and recycled clays that are fired twice to create everyday durability.

subs.title: Dove Gray

subs.title: Beachgrass Green

CATEGORIES.title: Glassware
CATEGORIES.description: Made in Japan, our soda-lime glassware is lightweight, scratch-resistant, and durable enough for everyday useâ€”and complements any table setting without stealing the show.

CATEGORIES.title: Serveware
CATEGORIES.description: Durably crafted and made to last, our serveware adds a refined look to weeknight dinners and special occasions alike.

CATEGORIES.title: Flatware
CATEGORIES.description: Crafted by the Herdmar family in the Porto region of Portugal, our flatware is restaurant quality and treated to last for years of dishwasher cycles.

CATEGORIES.title: Textiles
CATEGORIES.description: Our textiles are woven in Belgium from 100% pure linen, and make a beautiful (and long-lasting) addition to any tabletop.

CATEGORIES.title: Bundles
CATEGORIES.description: Looking to make the perfect set, but don't know where to start? Look no further. We've bundled our collections to make it easy to set your table and save.

PRODUCTS.caption: Fable Home
PRODUCTS.title: Glassware Set
PRODUCTS.content:
Glassware essentials for everyday use that look just as good on the table as they do on your kitchen shelves.

  • Scratch resistant, lead-free, and long lasting
  • Crafted in Japan using an ion-toughening technique for durability
  • The Tall Glasses nest neatly into the Short Glasses for easy storage
  • Comes in a set of 4 Tall Glasses and 4 Short Glasses

Don't be fooled by its delicate look and lightweight feel. Our premium Japanese soda-lime glassware is treated with a special technique to give it near-shatterproof strength.

spec.Bundle Specs: Short: 3.15 in. diameter, 3.15 in. height. Holds 11.8oz. Tall: 3 in. diameter, 5.6 in. height. Holds 18oz
spec.Care information: Our dishwasher safe glassware is highly durable and easy to care for.

PRODUCTS.title: The Short Glasses
PRODUCTS.subtitle: Dishwasher Safe
PRODUCTS.content:
From iced coffee in the morning to a slow sip in the evening, our soda-lime glassware does it all. It's lightweight and ultra thin, yet highly durable and perfect for everyday use.

Don't be fooled by its delicate look and lightweight feel. Our premium Japanese soda-lime glassware is treated with a special technique to give it near-shatterproof strength.

Comes in a set of 4.

spec.Materials: Lead-free soda-lime glass. Strengthened with an ion-toughening technique. Crafted in Japan
spec.Dimensions: 3.15 in. diameter, 3.15 in. height. Holds 11.8oz. 1.1mm rim thickness
spec.Care information: Our dishwasher safe glassware is highly durable and easy to care for.

PRODUCTS.title: The Tall Glasses
PRODUCTS.subtitle: Dishwasher Safe
PRODUCTS.content:
An everyday essential, whether it's for a tall drink of water or a dressed-up cocktail. Our soda-lime glasses are lightweight and ultra thin, yet highly durable and perfect for everyday use.

Don't be fooled by its delicate look and lightweight feel. Our premium Japanese soda-lime glassware is treated with a special technique to give it near-shatterproof strength.

Comes in a set of 4.

spec.Materials: Lead-free soda-lime glass. Strengthened with an ion-toughening technique. Crafted in Japan
spec.Dimensions: 3 in. diameter, 5.6 in. height. Holds 18oz. 1.1mm rim thickness
spec.Care information: Our dishwasher safe glassware is highly durable and easy to care for.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We create products that are as enjoyable as they are ethical.

landing.heading: Sustainably crafted goods to elevate your everyday.

testimonies.title: We believe in simple, timeless, and responsible designs.

items.quote: Such beautiful dishes that I have come to refer to as my shelf art! if you have open shelving these dishes are for you. They are unique.
items.author: Glen, Niagara Falls, ON

items.quote: I loved these dishes from the get-go! Knew I had to have them. I chose three colours and they go together beautifully.
items.author: Vanessa, Sherwood Park, AB

items.quote: If you've been contemplating purchasing these plates - go for it! They've elevated my dining experience and make meals so much more enjoyable!
items.author: Tobi, Vancouver, BC

info.title: Responsible Design
info.description: Designed with integrity and durably crafted for everyday use.

info.title: Transparent Pricing
info.description: We believe in accessible pricing and full transparency. Our pricing model is an open book.

info.title: Sustainable Sourcing
info.description: We only partner with people who put the earth, and its people, first.

info.title: Giving Back
info.description: Thanks to Mealshare, every purchase directly donates a meal to a youth in need.

BLOG.title: Sweet & Savory Comfort Food Recipes
BLOG.summary: Comfort food doesn't always look like mac 'n cheeseâ€”it often looks like a memory in meal form, passed down from someone special. This Mother's Day, we're honouring all the women who have lent strength, guidance, and delicious recipes to our livesâ€”from mothers, grandmothers, aunts, and sisters, to our chosen family of godmothers and close friends. To celebrate them all, our team has gathered together four favorite family recipes from special women in our lives.

BLOG.title: Bringing Joy to Every Table
BLOG.summary: For many, it has become a daily routine to prepare nutritious meals for our families and friends, served on carefully chosen dinnerware. The food we eat becomes merely a second thought to the presentation and experience of our meals.

BLOG.title: Preparing a Dinner Table for Success
BLOG.summary: Decorating your dinner table is a fun task that can make or break your dinner party. Everyone who sits down for a meal is going to enjoy a beautifully decorated table. Whether you're hanging out on bar stools in a breakfast nook or you're serving up a meal on an antique, solid wood dining table (that just so happens to match your coffee table), these home decor tips can take your table from everyday to stylish.
